name: ratings-aggregator
description: Stremio add-on providing aggregated ratings from various sources.

scripts.docker:run: if [ -f .env ]; then docker run -p 61262:61262 --env-file .env ratings-aggregator; else echo 'ERROR: .env file not found! Create one from .env.example' && exit 1; fi
scripts.docker:build-run: if [ -f .env ]; then docker build --build-arg VITE_HOME_BLURB="$(grep '^VITE_HOME_BLURB=' .env | cut -d= -f2-)" -t ratings-aggregator . && docker run -p 61262:61262 --env-file .env ratings-aggregator; else echo 'ERROR: .env file not found! Create one from .env.example' && exit 1; fi
